name: Gobz: To The Moon
description:
Gobz #NFT is a horde of 5,555 randomly created Goblins with plans to overrun humanity. (with their sense of sleek fashion, nothing evil related.)

You can check out their Twitter page or Opensea page from the links below.

GobzNFT Twitter

GobzNFT Opensea

Credits

All the music you will hear in the game is made by Ali Özcanlı. You can follow him on Twitter.
